body.name: Mytrix New Upgraded AutoFocus 1080p Webcam with Microphone and Privacy Cover, Noise Reduction, Streaming Full HD USB Web Camera for PC Mac Laptop Desktop Zoom Meeting Skype FaceTime Hangouts YouTube
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 10 mins
features: 【HD Webcam 1080p Autofocus】 The PC Webcam with a 2-megapixel CMOS features up to a 1080p resolution at 30 fps. With a 7cm starting point and a nearly infinite range, the autofocus feature is able to ensure your videos are always sharp and crystal clear. AutoFocus can also be turned off in Windows/Mac App to set the camera to any focal distance as you like. The other fixed focus camera gives you blurry images if you are not within the range of camera pre-set focal distance.

【Webcam with Privacy Cover】 The privacy cover for the PC Webcam covers the lens when it is not in use. It's perfect to help provide security, and peace of mind to anyone, from individuals to large companies. It also helps to protect the lens from dirt and debris to ensure your video remains clear for the life of the camera.

【Webcam with Microphone】 Great for webinars, video conferencing, live streaming, etc. The built-in Noise-canceling microphone reduces ambient noise to enhance the sound quality of your video. Even in noisy surroundings you can capture the sounds you want.

【USB Webcam Plug and Play】 Works with USB 2.0, NO additional drivers required. Ready to use in less than 1 min with any compatible device. The convenient foldable design allows you to easily take it anywhere, and the 6.5 Inch (2 Meter) USB cord is long enough for any task. Just plug it in and you are ready to go!

【Widely Compatible & Multi Application】The webcam is compatible with Multiple Operating Systems. The webcam can be compatible with the current popular video/meeting softwares. Compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10, Chrome OS, Mac OS 10.6, and Android 5.0 or above

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Conference Meetings Multi-functional & Easy to Use - For conference meetings Plugin the USB and running immediately without having to install any drivers, giving you the hassle-free conference meeting experience. The built-in microphone with noise reduction and echo-canceling technology capturing your voice from every angle while making sure you are heard very clearly. Online Live Show Multi-functional & Easy to Use - For online live show The universal attachment base fits on any laptop, monitor, flat surface, and the tripod mount makes it even greater; With the 360-degree rotatable feature, giving you the most flexible streaming experience. The fast and accurate autofocus ensures the camera stay focused on your face automatically even if you move around, presenting you in the best state. Family Online Meeting Multi-functional & Easy to Use - For family online meeting The built-in noise-canceling mics let you chat with your family or friends without having to locate a mic. The autofocus and facial-enhancement technology optimize the image automatically, with the auto light correction feature, making you look great in any light condition. Streaming Multi-functional & Easy to Use - For streaming Excellent video quality on YouTube, Skype, Facebook, Zoom, Twitch, Face time, OBS, XBOX ONE, Hangouts, and more, connect with superior clarity every time you go live. Focus range 7cm to infinity and full HD means your recorded videos are crisp and vibrantly colored, compatible with 1920*1080p at 30fps.

360 Degree Rotatable 360 Degree rotatable compact design camera Multi-Functional Base Universal attachment base design, fits any laptop, monitor, tripod, and flat surface USB 2.0 Interface Compatible with PC/laptop/Mac/Monitor with USB port

HD 1080P Computer Camera: 1.Full HD 1080P and high-quality resolution bring Crystal Clear Pictures to you. Enjoy true-to-life HD 1080P video at 30 fps. 2.Privacy Protection: With the privacy protector, there is no need to worry about being hacked or watched. 3.Premium AutoFocus: High sensitivity autofocus speed, smoothly and rapidly, without the tedious focusing process. This camera is capable of dealing with the various working environment. 4.Dual Microphone: The Dual-Microphone design enables the camera to catch your voice precisely. The auto-denoise function could largely improve the call quality. 5.HDR High Dynamic Range: HDR provides outstanding performance even in dim light or poorly backlight settings. Video automatically adjusts shadowy or harsh lighting conditions which makes you always look best on the camera. 6.Highly Compatible with most video conferencing apps & streaming apps: This 1080P camera dynamically captures clear video and superior audio for a near face-to-face experience no matter for meeting video conferencing, family video chatting, gaming, webinars, online classes, and Skype, Google Hangouts, Yahoo!, AOL Instant Messenger, Zoom, ooVoo, Vsee, Windows Live Messenger, OBS, mixer, Youtube, Facebook, XSplit, Amazon Chime, LifeSize and FaceTime for Mac, laptop and PC, and other popular instant messaging applications. Driver Free, works well with Windows 7, 8, 10 or later, Mac OS 10.6 or later. 7.Background Replacement:This 1080P camera supports background replacement. You can easily change the background via Chromacam software.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This works great if you can figure out how to use it. I suggest using You Tube videos for detailed information. I use this for church services and Sunday school meetings via Zoom necessitated by the covid-19 lockdowns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for job interviews, streaming
reviews.reviewText: Not sure why many other reviews focus on the price, but don't buy this for over $60. I've been using this since April 22nd for reference to time of usage before review. Also, it is plug-and-play, so I added no software or drivers; using Windows 10.Looking at this overall it is 5 stars for the price. I've used this for streaming, the 1080p recording comes in clear when using OBS. Using this for Microsoft Teams, the picture was clear and the audio was also clear and my interview went smooth.There is only one place thus far it isn't performing perfectly, and that is within the website Roll20.net which is where I play group DnD sometimes. The video performance is clear, but issue is that it is slow, perhaps 15fps slow, which isn't an issue for this use case, but I had to make sure it was known it isn't perfect.Given that during the stay-at-home orders Amazon is sold out of many products, this was on prime and came quickly. Certainly a worthy knockoff of Logitech webcams to use when you cannot find any Logitech items for sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for general use.
reviews.reviewText: Inexpensive. Good for general use such as video conferencing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazon should have caught this
reviews.reviewText: The webcam works fine but I was forced by circumstance to buy it during the corona virus transition to work from home. This one was one that I could get in a few days as opposed to the regularly priced ones that would take two or three weeks to receive. I paid $166 when two weeks later the price was dropped to $60. There's nothing that I can do about it, I just had to let myself get robbed. I don't think that I'll be renewing my prime membership.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for high quality webinars
reviews.reviewText: In Zoom meetings now I am the most clear. Microphone works great and camera is HD. Plug and play, super easy to use, no software. Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars May want to look at others
reviews.reviewText: Do not believe it is true 1080. Might be interpolated up. Soft compared to other cams. Returned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Plugged it in and it did not work
reviews.reviewText: Just received the Mytrix Autofocus camera and it is supposed to be plug and play. Plugged it in but it did not play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021
